body.p: If a sale and leaseback transaction was accounted for as a sale and operating lease applying IAS 17, the seller-lessee shall:

li.p: account for the leaseback in the same way as it accounts for any other operating lease that exists at the date of initial application; and

adjust the leaseback right-of-use asset for any deferred gains or losses that relate to off-market terms recognised in the statement of financial position immediately before the date of initial application.
